title: Sun Transit in the 2nd House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits the 2nd house for Sagittarius Ascendant, focus shifts to wealth, speech, and personal values. This phase highlights self-respect through financial stability and authoritative communication. Earnings can improve through leadership or family-linked responsibilities, but ego-driven spending or harsh speech may create friction. Family dynamics demand maturity and restraint. When confidence is balanced with humility, this transit strengthens financial discipline, refines values, and enhances a commanding yet responsible voice.

sections.title: Finance
points: Spending driven by pride needs control

closing: This Sun transit strengthens values and financial authority. With humility, it builds lasting wealth, respect, and responsible self-expression.
